minimumSlotsCountPerDrivingLesson: Minimum number of a 30 min slots that constitute a valid lesson.
maximumSlotsCountPerDrivingLesson: Maximum number of a 30 min slots that constitute a valid lesson.
lastMinuteBookingEnabledSubtitle: Allow booking a lesson less than a day before
holidaysEnrollmentEnabledSubtitle: Block possibility to book to national days-off
canStudentBookDrivingLessonTitle: Allow students to book the lessons themselves
canStudentBookDrivingLessonSubtitle: You can control weather in your organization booking process will be managed by a dedicated employee or students can sign up themselves
